question: How can I participate in Codenovate?
answer: You can participate in this competition by clicking on the 'Register' button in the top right corner of this page.

question: Is Codenovate open to students from all universities and courses?
answer: Yes, Codenovate is open to students pursuing B.Tech/B.E./B.Sc programs across ALL engineering colleges in India (Batch 2025, 2026, 2027 & 2028)

question: What should I bring to the event?
answer: Participants should bring their own laptops, chargers, and any tools or software they may need to work on their projects.

question: Is there a registration fee for participating in this competition?
answer: There is a registration fee of â‚¹400 for Round 1 (Idea Submission Round).

question: Is transportation available?
answer: No, transportation will not be provided for the participants.

question: Will food be provided during the event?
answer: Yes, food and refreshments will be provided throughout the event for all participants.

question: Can I participate individually if I don't have a team?
answer: No, you cannot participate individually. Teams must consist of 3-4 members. If you don't have a team, we encourage you to team up with other participants or reach out to your friends or classmates to form a team.

question: Is there a specific format for the Idea Submission submission in Round 1?
answer: Yes,There is a PPT template available on unstop with a slide limit of 6.

question: Is the competition online or offline?
answer: Round 1 will be held online. Finale will be an offline event at KMIT.

question: Are cross-college teams allowed?
answer: Yes, inter-college teams are allowed. Teams can consist of participants from different engineering colleges.

question: Are cross-year teams allowed?
answer: Yes, teams can include participants from different years.

question: What benefits do participants get in the first round?
answer: After the first round registrations, participants will gain access to an exclusive course from Tutorials point for free ,designed to enhance their skills and help them along with other exciting prizes.

question: Will internet be provided?
answer: Internet will not be provided, please bring your own connection.
